description:
NEW LECTURES JUST ADDED for July/August 2016 about profiting from a fall in currencies and how to profit from soaring market volatility.  Just in time for the market madness of Brexit!

How will you react during the next bear market? Will you make panicked decisions that you later regret? Will crashing markets destroy your ability to enjoy a financially secure and stress-free life? 

This course is designed for people that want to take control of their finances and increase their net worth - even when financial markets are in complete chaos.

Although crashing prices, also known as a "bear market," are fearful for most people, wise investors know that falling markets are a wonderful opportunity to capitalize on the fear and greed of others. 

In this course, I take you by the hand and behind the scenes to show you step-by-step everything you need to know about bear markets - teaching you proven investing strategies that are easy and simple to implement.

I put my 20+ years of hands-on experience in the financial services industry to work for you!

As the inventor of the Portfolio Report Report Card service, which has now been used to analyze and grade over $120 million in investment accounts, and as the Founder of ETFguide, I have personally helped thousands of investors just like you.

By the end of this course, you'll have the confidence to manage your own investments and you'll know exactly where to start and what to do.

+++++++++++++++++++

...and you also get the unconditional Udemy backed 30 day money-back guarantee PLUS my personal promise that if you apply yourself, you will succeed. 

How will I benefit from this course?

Learn how to protect your IRA, 401(k) and other investments when prices are falling

  • See the importance of having a margin of safety within your investment plan
  • Learn about the differences between a bear market and a simple market correction
  • Discover that bear markets are not limited to just stocks
  • Understand the history of bear markets to give you perspective about future crashes
  • Find out which ETFs are designed to increase in value during bear markets 
  • Get general guidelines for using leveraged ETFs
  • Help with planning ahead for the next bear market

Who should take this course?

Anyone who owns stocks, bonds, real estate, mutual funds, and ETFs

  • Anyone with a 401(k), 403(b), 457, IRA, Roth IRA, or another retirement plan
  • Anyone who wants timely and practical strategies for their investments
  • Anyone who wants to grow and protect their investments
title: Profit During Crashing Markets: A Step-by-Step Guide
